enabled.description: Whether to enable encryption at rest. Default is `false`.

keyArn.description:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the encryption key. Required when `key_type` is `CUSTOMER_MANAGED_CMK`.

The `extended_s3_configuration` object supports the same fields from s3_configuration as well as the following:

keyType.description: Type of encryption key. Default is `AWS_OWNED_CMK`. Valid values are `AWS_OWNED_CMK` and `CUSTOMER_MANAGED_CMK`
